Always update README.md when making changes to intonation_trainer.py or config_template.yaml!
Always add unit tests and run them yourself for new features or bug fixes in intonation_trainer.py!
When updating README.md, ensure that code snippets are correct and tested.
For new features or fixes always create new pull requests; do not push directly to main branch.
Do not reuse pull request titles; make them descriptive for each new PR.
Do not reuse pull requests; create a new one (into main branch) for each change.
Do not remove this file; it is used to instruct GitHub Copilot on how to contribute to this project.
